output_list.description: The mintToken function allows the owner to increase the total supply of the token arbitrarily, which is a potential security issue.
The buy function uses a hardcoded price, allowing attackers to control the price and cause a DoS attack.
The sell function uses a hardcoded price, allowing attackers to control the price and cause a DoS attack.
The transferFrom function allows attackers to steal arbitrary amounts of tokens from any address, due to incorrect access control.
The approveAndCall function allows attackers to steal arbitrary amounts of tokens from any address, due to incorrect access control.
